reviewText: Good video. Marv Albert and Frank Layden are funny. Lots of slam dunks and bloopers. Good use of film splices.
This is a classic in sports videos.  Funny bloopers, awesome dunks, and one of the best presentations of the dunk contests ever.

I love this tape. I use to own it back in the day, now I have it again!
Wish I could find it on dvd!
Silky segway by Laden!  This was a great trip back in time for any kid who enjoyed the NBA in the early 80's
This is an incredible video. The bloopers are hillarious and the dunks are fantastic. Definitly get a copy of this video.
